subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hedo Turkoglu scored 27 points, including 9 in the final five minutes, to help the Orlando Magic pull away and clinch a playoff berth with a 122-111 victory against Indiana on Saturday night.
snippet: Hedo Turkoglu scored 27 points, including 9 in the final five minutes, to help the Orlando Magic pull away and clinch a playoff berth with a 122-111 victory against Indiana on Saturday night.
